values: 假定；假设；设想；推测；承担（责任、角色等）；担任；就职；采取；呈现（外观、特征等）；假装；冒充；篡夺；霸占

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重以过去经验或根据现实的某些感觉把某事认定为是事实。
常用词，意义较广泛，指缺乏确切事实，根据一些现象进行的推测，也可指为论证而提出合乎逻辑推理的某种假定，有时仅表示自己的意见。
常用词，指毫无根据仅凭个人主观臆断或碰运气的猜测。
指为证实一个理论的正确性而进行的假设。
指有很少或完全无根据的武断推测或不合逻辑的推理。

word_group.brief_definition: 假定；假设；想当然的认为
承担责任；担起责任；负起责任

bilingual.source: You can reasonably assume that he will be late.
bilingual.target: 你可以合理地假设他会迟到。

bilingual.source: Let's assume that the meeting will start on time.
bilingual.target: 让我们假设会议会准时开始。

bilingual.source: We assume that these data fit a normal distribution.
bilingual.target: 我们假设这些数据符合正态分布。

bilingual.source: Scientists often assume certain conditions in their experiments.
bilingual.target: 科学家在实验中经常假设某些条件。

bilingual.source: We should not assume everyone understands the instructions.
bilingual.target: 我们不应该假设每个人都理解这些指示。

bilingual.source: Engineers often assume water to be incompressible in their calculations.
bilingual.target: 工程师在计算中经常假设水是不可压缩的。

bilingual.source: Engineers often assume an isentropic process to simplify calculations.
bilingual.target: 工程师们经常假设一个等熵的过程来简化计算。

bilingual.source: It's risky to assume that the market will always go up.
bilingual.target: 假设市场总是会上升是有风险的。

bilingual.source: It is fallacious to assume that all rich people are happy.
bilingual.target: 假设所有富人都幸福是谬误的。

list.abstract: assume，英文单词，动词，翻译为假定、承担、篡夺、擅用等。

yingyinNormal.en: You're being tapped for VP. Let's assume that's true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您要被提拔为副总统了。假设那是真的。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to assume everyone aboard those carriers is Hydra.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不得不假设那上面都是九头蛇的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, let's assume, by some miracle, you actually catch a fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们假设奇迹降临，你真的钓上来一条鱼。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's say Claire gets it. I assume I stay on, if you get the general.
yingyinNormal.zh: 假设克莱尔成功了，如果你赢了的话，我可以留任吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean let's assume that they couldn't have been caught and let's adhere $10,000.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们假设他们的偷窃不会被发现钱包里有一万美金。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if you assume 15 tampons per cycle and a 28-day cycle. Are you fairly regular?
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在假设你每次用15条，28天一周期，你经期正常吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We have to assume this is happening. We need to end her campaign before it begins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须假设这事是真的，我们必须在她参选之前就堵死她的路子。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, let's assume, ad argumentum, that in this case, Leonard is wrong. Leonard is wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那我假设，当然是谬误论证，在这情况下，是莱纳德错了。就是他的错。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if we assume your looks are average, right off the bat, 50% of men on Earth are more attractive than you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 假设你的外貌是算中等，随便一算地球上有一半的男人比你还有魅力。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll skip the details and assume you had a long, fulfilling life so we can get to what is really important -- how you die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们把细节跳过，假设你拥有长久而幸福的一生然后再来看看最关键的部分——你怎么死的。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, all right, let's assume your hypothesis. We went to dinner, we talked, we laughed, we kissed. Where could I have possibly gone wrong?
yingyinNormal.zh: 行啊，咱就说说你的假设，我们一起去吃饭，有说有笑，有吻有抱，这还能错到哪儿去啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Which suggests either a remarkable passivity among the, I assume, 24 to 36 residents of this building, based on the number of mailboxes and given typical urban population density or a shared delusion of functionality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就说明要么这楼的24到36户人家，我假设的，基于邮箱的个数和典型的城市人口密度得出的都特别懒散，要么都同时产生功能性错觉。

yingyinNormal.en: I never said. I implied and let the people assume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没说过。我只是在暗示 故意引导人们那样想

yingyinNormal.en: So it is with a heavy heart that I assume the throne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在极悲恸的心情下登上王位。

yingyinNormal.en: I assume you're going to give me an explanation at some stage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他也可以这么说你。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna smell him? I assume we're talking about the baby now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要不要嗅嗅他？我想你指的是宝宝吧？

yingyinNormal.en: See, now, why would you assume that? Just because we're married?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么你那样以为呢？就因为我们已经结婚了吗?

yingyinNormal.en: I can only assume you have an opinion as to which road must be taken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样的话，我只能认为你已经想好了我该怎么做。

yingyinNormal.en: Yup. He's pretty great. I assume you and Shoulder Blades are clanned up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错。他超厉害的。所以你和大块头是组队的。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you awake? Of course I'm awake. Assume from now on that I'm always awake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还没睡？我当然还没睡。从今往后我是睡不着啦。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 假定; 猜想; 认为

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假定；臆断；上任；就职；圣母升天；傲慢；自以为是；圣母升天节

word_family.mean: v. 假设；臆断；承担；就；呈现；具有；假装；僭取；夺取

sense_info_list.en: suppose to be the case, without proof
sense_info_list.zh: 假定; 猜想; 认为

examination_example.sentence: And, <highlight>assuming</highlight> he says yes, it will make you feel more confident about voicing your disagreement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，假设他答应了，这也会让你更有信心表达你的不同意见。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, <highlight>assuming</highlight> you're lost in an area humans tend to frequent, look for the marks we leave on the landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，假设你在人类经常出没的地方迷路了，寻找我们在景观上留下的痕迹。

examination_example.sentence: You might even be tempted to <highlight>assume</highlight> that humanity has little future to look forward to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你甚至可能会想当然地认为人类没有什么可期待的未来。

examination_example.sentence: "Many young people <highlight>assume</highlight> a great deal of personal responsibility for educating themselves and actively seeking out opposing viewpoints," the survey concluded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查总结道，“许多年轻人承担了很大的个人责任来教育自己，并积极寻求相反的观点。”

examination_example.sentence: In them we can see biophilia—a yearning for contact with nonhuman life—<highlight>assuming</highlight> uncanny representational forms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从这些建筑中，我们看到了人类热爱生命的天性——渴望接触非人类生命——呈现出一种难以置信的具象派形态。

word_usage.usage:
表示“推测、假定”时：
assume指想当然地将未经证实的事当真，比较武断。
presume常指以已有的经验、信息等为依据，进行合乎逻辑的推测、推断，但结论仍可能有误。
suppose指在某一前提条件下或根据已有知识、信息等进行推测，有时仅用于表达意见。

assume作不及物动词时表示装腔作势，多管闲事。示例：
He contented himself by assuming an air of superiority. 
他表现出一副高高在上的样子以获得自我满足。
assume和presume都可以表示“假定”“假设”的意思，但assume指无根据的推测或不合逻辑的推理，而presume指根据过去经验或某些感觉某事认定为事实。
假设某人/某事为......可以表示为assume sb./sth. to be。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“假定、设想、采取”,有时指没有证据的推测或想象。
意为“假定、假设”，常指根据经验所做出的推测。

disambiguation.sense_group: 推测; 假定; 假设

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: Many people <highlight>assume</highlight> that our attitudes are internally consistent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人认为我们的态度是内在一致的。

sense_info_list.en: begin to have power or responsibility

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指有很少或完全无根据的武断推测或不合逻辑的推理。
侧重主观推测或主观设想。
常用词, 指毫无根据仅凭个人主观臆断或碰运气的猜测。
书面用词, 指有待作进一步检验或证实的假设。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假定；臆断；上任；就职；圣母升天；傲慢；自以为是；圣母升天节

word_family.mean: v. 假设；臆断；承担；就；呈现；具有；假装；僭取；夺取

sense_info_list.en: suppose to be the case; without proof

examination_example.sentence: People automatically <highlight>assume</highlight> children are anxious about math because they are poor achievers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们自然而然地认为孩子们是因为成绩很差才对数学感到焦虑。

examination_example.sentence: They would <highlight>assume</highlight> you had problems getting a job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会认为你找工作有困难。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>assume</highlight> that if and when they have children, it will be even harder for them to advance in their careers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有了孩子，那她们的职场晋升之路怕是难上加难。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指有很少或完全无根据的武断推测或不合逻辑的推理。
侧重主观推测或主观设想。
常用词，指毫无根据仅凭个人主观臆断或碰运气的猜测。
书面用词，指有待作进一步检验或证实的假设。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: suppose to be the case, without proof

examination_example.sentence: Why do we often <highlight>assume</highlight> that more is more when it comes to kids and their belongings?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么当涉及到孩子和他们的财产时，我们总是认为越多越好？
